tree.content: # ğŸ–¼ï¸ PROMPTS PARA IA - NANO BANANA PRO ## Retiro Anti-Carnaval Acelerador de AudiÃªncia > **InstruÃ§Ãµes para uso**: Copie e cole cada prompt abaixo no Nano Banana Pro. Todos os prompts estÃ£o em inglÃªs para melhores resultados. > **Notas**: Ãcones devem ser criados manualmente ou baixados de biblioteca (Nano Banana nÃ£o gera bons Ã­cones). --- ## ğŸ“‹ ÃNDICE DE IMAGENS | # | Nome do Arquivo | Uso | SeÃ§Ã£o | |---|-----------------|-----|-------| | 01 | `hero-carnival-window.png` | Background do hero | Hero | | 02 | `epiphany-bridge.png` | IlustraÃ§Ã£o da histÃ³ria | Epiphany Bridge | | 03 | `day-01-foundations.png` | Ãcone Dia 1 | SoluÃ§Ã£o | | 04 | `day-02-creation.png` | Ãcone Dia 2 | SoluÃ§Ã£o | | 05 | `day-03-distribution.png` | Ãcone Dia 3 | SoluÃ§Ã£o | | 06 | `day-04-monetization.png` | Ãcone Dia 4 | SoluÃ§Ã£o | | 07 | `certificate.png` | Preview do certificado | EntregÃ¡veis | | 08 | `mask-decoration.png` | MÃ¡scara veneziana decorativa | Decorativo | | 09 | `feather-decoration.png` | Penas decorativas | Decorativo | | 10 | `testimonial-male-01.png` | Foto depoimento masculino | Prova Social | | 11 | `testimonial-female-01.png` | Foto depoimento feminino | Prova Social | | 12 | `confetti-texture.png` | Textura de confete (opcional) | Background | | 13 | `carnival-bokeh.png` | Luzes de carnaval desfocadas | Background | | 14 | `carnival-street.png` | Cena de rua do carnaval | Hero Alternativo | | 15 | `carnival-float.png` | Float de carnaval (detalhe) | Decorativo | | 16 | `samba-dancer.png` | Silhueta de passista | Decorativo | | 17 | `carnival-parade.png` | Desfile de carnaval completo | Hero Full | | 18 | `headdress-closeup.png` | Close-up de fantasia | Detalhe | | 19 | `carnival-drummers.png` | Bateria de escola de samba | DinÃ¢mico | --- ## ğŸ¯ PROMPTS DETALHADOS ### 01. Hero Background - Carnival Through the Window ``` Interior of a dark minimalist room, black walls, viewed from inside looking out through a large floor-to-ceiling window. Outside the window is a CLEARLY VISIBLE Brazilian carnival street scene at night - distant but recognizable: colorful carnival parade floats with elaborate gold decorations, samba dancers in feathered costumes visible as silhouettes, street decorated with carnival banners and flags. The outdoor scene is slightly out of focus (depth of field) but distinctly CARNIVAL - you can see carnival floats, people in carnival costumes, festive street lights. The window glass has subtle reflection. Inside: clean, focused workspace with warm golden lamp light on a desk, laptop open, creating sharp contrast between the chaotic carnival outside and the peaceful focused interior. 8K, photorealistic, cinematic lighting, shot from inside looking out. --ar 16:9 --stylize 250 --v 6.0 ``` **Salvar como:** `hero-carnival-window.png` --- ### 02. Epiphany Bridge Illustration ``` Split scene illustration showing contrast between carnival outside and focus inside. LEFT SIDE (outside the window): Brazilian carnival scene - carnival parade float passing by with people in colorful feathered costumes dancing, samba musicians with drums, street decorated with carnival flags and banners, festive atmosphere with purple, green, and gold colors. RIGHT SIDE (inside the room): sharp focused person working at a desk in dark room, golden warm light illuminating their face and laptop, peaceful and productive. The window frame clearly separates the two worlds - carnival chaos outside vs focused work inside. Editorial illustration style, detailed but clean. --ar 3:2 --stylize 200 --v 6.0 ``` **Salvar como:** `epiphany-bridge.png` --- ### 03. Day 1 Icon - Foundations (NÃƒO USAR NANO BANANA) ``` âŒ Use biblioteca de Ã­cones ou crie manualmente SugestÃ£o: Lucide Icons, Heroicons, ou Phosphor Icons Ãcone: Foundation/Building blocks ``` **Alternativa:** Usar emoji ğŸ”§ ou criar SVG manual **Salvar como:** `day-01-foundations.svg` (preferido) ou `.png` --- ### 04. Day 2 Icon - Content Creation (NÃƒO USAR NANO BANANA) ``` âŒ Use biblioteca de Ã­cones ou crie manualmente SugestÃ£o: Lucide Icons, Heroicons, ou Phosphor Icons Ãcone: Edit/Pencil/File ``` **Alternativa:** Usar emoji âœï¸ ou criar SVG manual **Salvar como:** `day-02-creation.svg` (preferido) ou `.png` --- ### 05. Day 3 Icon - Distribution (NÃƒO USAR NANO BANANA) ``` âŒ Use biblioteca de Ã­cones ou crie manualmente SugestÃ£o: Lucide Icons, Heroicons, ou Phosphor Icons Ãcone: Share/Network/Broadcast ``` **Alternativa:** Usar emoji ğŸ“¤ ou criar SVG manual **Salvar como:** `day-03-distribution.svg` (preferido) ou `.png` --- ### 06. Day 4 Icon - Monetization (NÃƒO USAR NANO BANANA) ``` âŒ Use biblioteca de Ã­cones ou crie manualmente SugestÃ£o: Lucide Icons, Heroicons, ou Phosphor Icons Ãcone: Trending Up/Dollar/Chart ``` **Alternativa:** Usar emoji ğŸ“ˆ ou criar SVG manual **Salvar como:** `day-04-monetization.svg` (preferido) ou `.png` --- ### 07. Certificate Design ``` Elegant certificate design with subtle carnival elements. Dark background with gold foil accents. Border pattern featuring Brazilian carnival motifs in gold line art - feather headdress elements, subtle mask outlines, carnival float ornaments. Header space for "CERTIFICADO DE CONCLUSÃƒO". Body text area with dotted lines. Bottom area for signature and gold wax seal with feather design. Professional, luxurious aesthetic - carnival elements are sophisticated and refined, not festive or cartoonish. Black and gold color scheme with subtle purple accents. 300 DPI, print-ready proportions. --ar 3:4 --stylize 200 --v 6.0 ``` **Salvar como:** `certificate.png` --- ### 08. Venetian Mask Decoration (Subtle) ``` Elegant Venetian-style carnival mask illustration with Brazilian carnival influence. Black mask with gold filigree details, subtle purple and green gem accents. Minimal line art style - sophisticated and mysterious, not cartoonish or overly festive. Single mask, frontal view, elongated venetian shape. Gold highlights on black background. Recognizable as carnival mask but elegant and refined. Suitable as decorative element. --ar 1:1 --stylize 100 --v 6.0 ``` **Salvar como:** `mask-decoration.png` --- ### 09. Feather Decoration Element ``` Cluster of elegant carnival feathers arranged as decorative corner element. Large ostrich feathers in purple, emerald green, and gold - the classic Brazilian carnival colors. The feathers have natural texture and gradient coloring. Sophisticated, not cartoonish. Arranged fanning out from bottom corner. Black background makes colors pop. Recognizable as carnival parade costume feathers. --ar 1:2 --stylize 100 --v 6.0 ``` **Salvar como:** `feather-decoration.png` --- ### 10. Testimonial Photo (Male - example) ``` Professional headshot of a confident man, dark background. Studio lighting with subtle golden rim light. He's smiling naturally, wearing casual professional attire. The background is dark gray/black. No text overlays. Professional photography style. Authentic, approachable expression. --ar 1:1 --stylize 100 --v 6.0 ``` **Salvar como:** `testimonial-male-01.png` **Gerar variaÃ§Ãµes:** `testimonial-male-02.png`, `testimonial-male-03.png` --- ### 11. Testimonial Photo (Female - example) ``` Professional headshot of a confident woman, dark background. Studio lighting with subtle golden rim light. She's smiling naturally, wearing casual professional attire. The background is dark gray/black. No text overlays. Professional photography style. Authentic, approachable expression. --ar 1:1 --stylize 100 --v 6.0 ``` **Salvar como:** `testimonial-female-01.png` **Gerar variaÃ§Ãµes:** `testimonial-female-02.png`, `testimonial-female-03.png` --- ### 12. Confetti Texture (for CSS background alternative) ``` Falling golden confetti mixed with subtle carnival elements - small feathers, carnival sequin sparkles. Dark black background. The confetti should be subtle - small square and rectangular golden pieces, some colorful feathers (purple, green), very light opacity. Clean, minimalist composition. High contrast between gold confetti and black background. Texture-style image suitable for overlay. --ar 16:9 --stylize 50 --v 6.0 ``` **Salvar como:** `confetti-texture.png` --- ### 13. Carnival Bokeh Lights (Background) ``` Out of focus Brazilian carnival scene at night, heavy bokeh effect but still recognizable as CARNIVAL. You can see blurred carnival parade floats with gold decorations, samba dancers in colorful feathered costumes (purple, green, gold feathers), carnival banners and flags waving. The scene is soft and blurred but distinctly carnival - look for carnival float silhouettes, feather costumes, street party lights. Black background with colorful circular bokeh from carnival elements. Dreamy but clearly carnival atmosphere. --ar 16:9 --stylize 100 --v 6.0 ``` **Salvar como:** `carnival-bokeh.png` --- ### 14. Carnival Street Scene (Through Window - Alternative) ``` View from inside a dark room looking out through window at Brazilian carnival street celebration. CLEAR CARNIVAL ELEMENTS visible: carnival parade float decorated with gold ornaments and feathers passing by, samba dancers in elaborate colorful costumes with feathered headdresses, street musicians with drums playing, crowd cheering, carnival banners hanging across the street. The outdoor scene is vibrant and alive - purple, green, and gold colors everywhere. The window frame creates border. Inside is dim with just a warm desk lamp. Sharp focus on window frame, depth of field blurs the carnival slightly but it's unmistakably a Brazilian carnival parade. 8K, photorealistic. --ar 16:9 --stylize 200 --v 6.0 ``` **Salvar como:** `carnival-street.png` --- ### 15. Carnival Float Detail (Decoration Element) ``` Close-up detail of a Brazilian carnival parade float - ornate gold decorations, large colorful feathers in purple, green, and gold, glittering sequins, velvet fabrics. Rich, luxurious carnival aesthetic. Dark background to make colors pop. Macro photography style, sharp details on feathers and gold ornaments. No text. Suitable as decorative corner element or overlay. --ar 1:1 --stylize 150 --v 6.0 ``` **Salvar como:** `carnival-float.png` --- ### 16. Samba Dancer Silhouette (Carnival Element) ``` Silhouette of a Brazilian carnival samba dancer in full feathered costume, profile view. Large feathered headdress with purple and gold feathers, elaborate costume, dancing pose. Backlit by carnival lights - colorful glow around the silhouette. Black silhouette against colorful bokeh background. Elegant, not cartoonish. Recognizable as Rio-style carnival costume. --ar 1:2 --stylize 150 --v 6.0 ``` **Salvar como:** `samba-dancer.png` --- ### 17. Carnival Parade at Night (Full Scene) ``` Brazilian carnival parade at night - wide shot showing the street celebration. Multiple carnival floats decorated with gold ornaments and colorful feathers passing by. Samba school dancers in coordinated costumes with large feathered headdresses in purple, green, and gold. Musicians with drums and percussion instruments. Crowd watching from sidelines. Street decorated with carnival banners and festive lights. The scene is vibrant and energetic - unmistakably Brazilian carnival. Nighttime with colorful illumination. Photorealistic, cinematic style. --ar 16:9 --stylize 250 --v 6.0 ``` **Salvar como:** `carnival-parade.png` --- ### 18. Carnival Headdress Close-up (Detail Shot) ``` Extreme close-up of a Brazilian carnival feathered headdress (fantasia). Large ostrich feathers in royal purple, emerald green, and golden yellow arranged in a fan pattern. Rhinestones and sequins catch the light. The feathers have iridescent quality - shimmering in the light. Rich, luxurious texture. Dark background to emphasize the vibrant colors. Macro photography style, sharp focus on feather details. Recognizable as Rio carnival costume element. --ar 1:1 --stylize 200 --v 6.0 ``` **Salvar como:** `headdress-closeup.png` --- ### 19. Carnival Street musicians (Drummers) ``` Brazilian carnival bateria (drum section) drummers playing. Musicians in coordinated carnival costumes with feathered details. Large samba drums (surdo, caixa, repinique) being played. Dynamic action shot - drummers in mid-performance, energetic poses. Background shows blurred carnival parade. Night scene with colorful lighting reflecting off instruments and costumes. The energy and rhythm of carnival drumming.
